v-251504---do-not-allow-accounts-configu.name: V-251504 - Do not allow accounts configured with blank or null password
v-251504---do-not-allow-accounts-configu.description: If an account has an empty password, anyone could log on and run commands with the privileges of that account. Accounts with empty passwords should never be used in operational environments.
